addonDesc.message: Kopi url fa'amau e fai ma hyperlinks po'o tusitusiga manino

selectaction.message: Seti le fa'agaioiga fa'amau lona tolu

cpyalllnk.message: Tapa uma e fai ma So'oga

cpyalltxt.message: Tape uma e pei o URL o Tusitusiga

cpysellnk.message: Tapa Filifilia e fai ma So'oga

cpyseltxt.message: Pepa Filifilia e avea ma URL o Tusitusiga

cpytabtxt.message: Lenei Tab e pei o Tusitusiga URL

cpytablnk.message: Lenei Tab e fai ma So'oga

cpyalllnknp.message: Tapa uma e fai ma So'oga (✂️)

cpyalltxtnp.message: Tape uma e pei o URL o Tusitusiga (✂️)

cpysellnknp.message: Tapa Filifilia e fai ma So'oga (✂️)

cpyseltxtnp.message: Pepa Filifilia e avea ma URL o Tusitusiga (✂️)

cpytablnknp.message: Lenei Tab e fai ma So'oga (✂️)

tip1.message: The active tab is always selected

tip2.message: Hold the CTRL key to select additional tabs

tip3.message: Hold SHIFT key to select a range of tabs

tip4.message: You can set custom shortcuts for all copy actions

tip5.message: All actions can also be found in the tab context menu

tip6.message: You can disable this popup in the addons preferences page

tip7.message: Use the middle mouse button to invoke the direct action

tip8.message: Set the direct copy action in the toolbar buttons context menu

tip9.message: Give the developer some feedback so he'll know whats good and what needs impovement
